roleset.name: to speak wildly or with enthusiasm
roleset.note: RAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rave' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rave.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Arvind Patel , a processor and exporter of the seed , raves : `` If psyllium takes the place of oat bran , it will be huge . ''
example.arg: Arvind Patel , a processor and exporter of the seed ,
If psyllium takes the place of oat bran , it will be huge
